name: Escenic Dynamic Web Page
summary: Web page dynamically generated by the Escenic Content Engine, an advanced platform for Web publishing and content management; typically contains server-side code that is parsed by the Web server, which generates HTML for the Web page.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
